price: 147. La vérité émane de ton Seigneur, alors ne sois pas de ceux qui doutent.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
